issue.subject: Extend grid (predefined perimeter) download
issue.description:
The actual system for grid download needs the full download URL to be provided by WFS service.

The problems are:
* The WFS service can be used for one data only (or need to have multiple download fields... )
* Service has to be updated if data URL changes
* The full download URL is visible in WFS service

The proposed alternative is:
* Use a code instead of full url in WFS
* Set the URL + a "to be replaced by code" part in it. (ex: http://www.example.com/path/{CODE}.zip)

The new field to set URL :
* will be mandatory
* will have a placeholder : http://www.example.com/path/{CODE}.zip
* will use a tooltip like all the other fields (difference with the proposed mockup below) 


To allow seamless update for current users of grid download, the URL has to be set to "{CODE}" on existing diffusions. So the full url of their services will be used.

!extend_grid_download.png!

custom_fields.name: Functional impact
custom_fields.value:
* Allow to reuse a perimeter for multiple diffusions.
* Hide the full URL from WFS service
* Seamless update for current users

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: One additional field in diffusion view
